original_text: The people of Israel had also done as Moses told them, for they had asked the Egyptians for silver and gold jewelry and for clothing.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 모세의 말대로 하여 애굽 사람에게 은금 패물과 의복을 구하매

sentences.original_text: The people of Israel had also done as Moses told them
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성들도 모세가 명한 대로 행하였다.

sentences.original_text: for they had asked the Egyptians for silver and gold jewelry
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 이집트 사람들에게 은과 금 보석을 구했기 때문이다.
